data.title: MALAYSIA CENTRAL: Directions: Chung Hwa Primary Girls' School, Jalan Damai with Location Map
data.meta_description: Malaysia Central: Directions & Map to SJK (C) Chung Hwa (P) - Chinese Primary Girls' School, Jalan Damai, Kuala Lumpur KL
data.text:
Address: Jalan Damai, off Jalan Ampang, Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia

Postcode (Poskod): 55000 Kuala Lumpur

Tel: +603 2148 6453

Fax: +603 2148 8831

Website: http://www.djz.edu.my/ (United Chinese School Commitees Association Of Malaysia)

Area: Wilayah Persekutuan Kuala Lumpur, Federal Territory of Kuala Lumpur (KL / WP)

Jurisdiction: Dewan Bandaraya Kuala Lumpur DBKL - KL City Hall (See Local Govt) Directions: From the main road of Jalan Ampang, approach Jalan Damai using Lorong Damai13 where Sucasa Hotel is located.

Info / Insights: The first Chinese school in Malaysia was set up in Penang in 1819. Today, there are over 1200 Chinese national-type primary schools nationwide. Together, these schools have an enrolment of over 600,000 students, at any one time.

The location of this Chung Hwa School is as serene as the name of the road suggests. Lined with old bungalows, Jalan Damai runs parallel to busy Jalan Ampang nearby. Because it is very near to the 'embassy row' of Jalan Ampang and Ampang Hilir, several buildings in the neighbourhood have been converted into embassies as well. Interestingly, there is a pocket of Middle-Eastern food restaurants here too, just like the preceding food street near Raffles College.

Variations In Spellings: Chong Wah, Choong Wa, Tiong Hua

Nearby Landmarks: SMK Puteri Ampang (A), SMK Sri Ampang (B), The Nomad SuCasa Hotel & Service Apartments (C)

Surroundings: Jalan Ampang, Jalan Damai, Lorong Damai, Jalan Mesra, Damascus Gate Arab & Gulf Food (D), Restoran Al-Rawsha (E), Al-Mahar Restaurant (F), Embassy Of The Czech Republic (G), Embassy Of Romania (H), AmpWalk - Amp Walk Mall (I), Embassy Of The Democratic People's Republic Of Algeria (J), Kelab Aman (K), Laos - Embassy of the Lao People's Democratic Republic (L), High Commission Of Bangladesh (M), Embassy Of The Republic Of Poland (O)

(use zoom and navigation buttons on top left of map to explore)

Nearby Hotels: Holiday Villa (J), SuCasa Hotel (N), Lanson Place (P)

Nearest Train Station: Damai LRT Station, Jelatek LRT Station

Nearest Police Station: Balai Polis Tun Razak (E), Tel: 03 2141 2222

Distance:

Bus Number:

GPS Coordinates: N3 09.758 E101 43.603
